pros: Also easy to cut for custom sizing
Some customers use them for bumper stickers
cons: While ideal for making picture or save-the-date magnets, not great for holding up much else

customer_reviews.title: Z Palette DIY Perfection
customer_reviews.text: So I got these today and I couldn't wait to use them. I really don't understand why anybody would leave a bad review. NO smell...at all. Easy...I mean EASY to pull apart AND cut. I have a harder time seperating paper sometimes. Lol. And...they work. It sticks well and I mean well. I had to be careful because I immediately knew I wouldn't be able to reajust. I had some empty containers I wanted to turn into cheaper DIY Z Palettes and the magnet is strong enough to hold the pans...upside down...I even shook it...hard! NOTHING fell! Just saying...
customer_reviews.author: JoJo27

customer_reviews.title: Strong enough to use on cars
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to make convoy markers for our Boy Scout troop. Laminated some bright orange paper onto them, cut into oval shapes, stick on the cars so we can tell all our silver minivans apart. They cut with scissors easily. Strong enough to hold on both front & back of car at highway speeds.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Flexible adhesive magnetic sheets
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with these magnetic sheets. They are on the thin side but have many uses. I am a Crafter and use the magnet side to hold my thin dies so they don't get lost. I then slip them into a page protector and put into a binder. The magnet is strong enough to hold all my dies in place and I have never had any problems with them slipping off. For my usage I do keep the paper on the back.I have just made my second purchase of this item.
customer_reviews.author: Dorisann C.

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These magnets are not even strong enough to hold themselves to a metal surface, never mind holding any object. I tried to get these to grab to every steel surface in my shop to no avail. Total waste of money. Ended up in the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: wooddust

customer_reviews.title: Teacher Review: A+
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my wife's second grade classroom. She went through a couple failed magnet sets as well as velcro. These worked like a charm. Durability: These held up 24x36 posters (laminated) Cost: The cost seems about equal to other products. Ease of Use: Peel and pluck, right out of the package. Some other magnets she tried, the paper ripped off the bottom upon opening! We will order these again next year for sure, and the next year, and the next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I wanted something to make stickers into magnets to put on my car (so I don't mess up the paint.... and I can change them out easily). Magnet works great - I've been driving for over a month with it on my car and it's still there. Great price point too.
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent magnet
customer_reviews.text: Magnet fit my 4x6 photos perfectly. The only issue I had was getting the photo lined up perfectly before laying it on the sticky surface. Once the photo makes contact with the surface, it’s “stuck”, there’s no way to reposition it.
customer_reviews.author: S. F. Russell

customer_reviews.title: They Won When Compared to a Similar Product.
customer_reviews.text: So good, I did a Facebook Live post about it. I compared it to a similar product for holding thin dies to a holder and this one was the one that I've purchased again since. They're easy to cut and stronger than the ones I compared them to. These have a matte finish. (The others had a shiny finish.) Affordable and perfect for what I need them for.
customer_reviews.author: Stamper Dog

customer_reviews.title: Garbage - Waste of Money - Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make magnetic book marks for my planner. The magnets do not have enough power to hold with one sheet of thin paper between them. I laminated my bookmark, folded, and put the magnets in between to hold together. As you can see in the picture..... I cannot even get one magnet to stick to the other. You can see the book mark is not huge and I used a generously size magnet (same size on both sides of bookmark). Worthless. I don't like to write negative reviews, but I also do not like to waste money.
customer_reviews.author: louishammer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I'm using them to hold dies/thinlets purchased individually. I trim off a little piece so they easily slide into photobook pages that have four pockets for 4x6" photos. I don't use the "adhesive" side, but gave it a 5 star rating because the magnetic side is nice and strong and hold the dies nicely in place. I will buy another package to use in the Stampin' Up die sets cases.
customer_reviews.author: karaTwaraTy

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my purposes.
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered these 3 times. We like to visit craft breweries. We used to always get a coaster and displayed them under glass on our bar. We ran out of room for the coasters, so we started getting stickers. I use these magnet sheets to turn the stickers into refrigerator magnets. The stickers adhere to the magnets wonderfully, and the magnets have plenty of strength to stay on the refrigerator, I even mount them on the refrigerator in our camper, and even with all the vibration of going down the road, they stay put. They are also easy to cut and priced right.
customer_reviews.author: JAMES C COX

customer_reviews.title: Just Right for Stickers!
customer_reviews.text: Very sticky, very easy to use, just the right thickness to cut with an Xacto knife (expect to use more than one blade, though). They worked absolutely perfect to turn our RedBubble sticker order into an enormous magnet set and I will definitely be buying more in the future (when I run out of them anyways!). My only complaint is that the magnet is not particularly strong, and anything less than a medium sized magnet struggles to hold paper up -- but that's more a preferential issue than a product issue.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Lots of uses
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these to use as markers for complicated knitting patterns, especially when they are in a magazine. These are excellent place-holders, move easily, and are the perfect size. Of course I don't remove the paper from the back side (so I don't know about the adhesion performance). I can think of other great uses -- attach adhesive side to non-magnetic surfaces (glass, etc.) to make a great place for leaving messages, etc. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Grace

customer_reviews.title: Trash
customer_reviews.text: They dont stick well at all. Bought them to hold a tool box down on metal and after using 3 pieces to stick in the bottom it's almost like there is nothing there. Useless junk in my eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Geo

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been purchasing these for several years to use inside stamp cases to hold metal framelits. They hold well. I’ve never had an issue with them coming off.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Strong adhesive and magnetization
customer_reviews.text: For a flexible magnet these are pretty strong. The 4x6 square is more than strong enough to hold a menu or document. Also the adhesive is strong.. maybe even a bit too strong. Be sure you have your photo or print out lined perfectly before it goes down because it's not coming back up. I'm using these to make decorative fridge magnets from beer and soda packs and they're working out great.
customer_reviews.author: K. Stone

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use, perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I only needed 1 sheet but it was cheaper to get these than just 1 sheet. The adhesive is really good, strong enough to stay put but if I have to remove it I won't have an issue. Used these on the bottom of my watercolor pans. The magnet stayed where I wanted it to be but a little bit of purposeful force I could move them to where I wanted them to be. If they get stuck together you don't have to wrestle with it to get the sheets apart. Will protect use these for future fridge magnet stickers too.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie Welvaert

customer_reviews.title: Great product, easy to use, saves you money on your project
customer_reviews.text: These were great to make my photos fridge ready! Other companies will charge you $5-$10 for one, plus shipping. I previously ordered from shutterfly, and was not 100% satisfied. But since trying these and making my own, I'll never order from there again. For $1.34 each I made my own and the quality is much better! I ordered my prints size 4x6 through my local walgreens and just stuck them on the magnets. No trimming necessary. I am ordering more because my homemade magnets were a hit at christmas as gifts for my family and I can't wait to make more!
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: Very versatile!
customer_reviews.text: Works great for keeping all my die cuts together and neat. I haven't lost a single teeny tiny die and the sheets are certainly not too heavy nor bulky. I've already ordered a second set for my craft room because the sheets have an adhesive backing and I can cut the sheets to size and hang things up.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Monahan

customer_reviews.title: They cut like butter, I'm using them for the coordinating dies ...
customer_reviews.text: Just started using my flexible adhesive magnetic. They cut like butter, I'm using them for the coordinating dies for my rubber stamps sets. Will be ordering more as needed!
customer_reviews.author: Peggy

customer_reviews.title: D.i.y. bride
customer_reviews.text: Used these as my save the date magnets. Wouldn't have it any other way and have gotten compliments on how nice they look. What I am most happy about is the price. In trying to save a buck I got these and 4x6 free photos from Snapfish. All in all everyone's save the dates were $.62 each!!. If I would have had to have paid for someone else or a company to do it. It would have been well over a dollar each.
customer_reviews.author: Elise

customer_reviews.title: Great for bumper stickers
customer_reviews.text: I hate putting bumper stickers on my car. These are a great way to still make a statement without worrying about damaging your paint or permanently sticking something to it. I simply stick the bumper sticker to the magnets and then i can put it on my car and take it off as a please. No paint damage.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy D

customer_reviews.title: An easy way to make some unique souvenirs
customer_reviews.text: I was putting together a hometown gift package for someone. I got some photos of local sights--a few I took myself and the rest I found online--printed them on photo paper, and mounted them on these magnetic sheets. I used an Xacto knife and a ruler to cut them out. The results looked great--you'd never know they were home-made. The recipient loves them.
customer_reviews.author: MaryMc

customer_reviews.title: Metal die organization
customer_reviews.text: I used this to organize metal dies for paper die cutting. Placed the dies on the magnet and then into a plastic sleeve. The magnet is thin enough to be flexible and cuts easily. Strong enough to hold dies in place. I have mine in a bin but feel like this could work well in a binder or mounted (maybe same strength, larger size?) Will be buying again as needed.
customer_reviews.author: DPro

customer_reviews.title: Flexible and works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: The best thing about this product is the ability to cut the sheets to whatever size I needed to fit my project. They worked perfectly. I peeled off the paper backing, put my own paper thing there right on the glue and then cut the magnet sheet to shape. It was fantastic. I only ordered one set because I wasn't sure if it would work. I should have ordered what I needed and will be ordering more in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Dana Wall-Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Turned my cubicle into a collage
customer_reviews.text: These are awesome! I used them to turn some 4x6 photos I printed through amazon into magnets and they worked perfectly! They are just barely longer than the 4x6 photos I purchased, but it was a quick trim with some sharp scissors and it looks like I had magnet photos professionally made.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Using them as magnetic game board backings
customer_reviews.text: The product is as described and delivery was under 48 hours from order placement. I am using them as magnetic game board backings for a game of tic-tac-toe for a child to play while waiting for food when the family eats out, or while in the car. I cut it square and it has just enough magnetic power to engage a small metal token, e.g., a bottle cap so that the token does not require a small magnet, which I feel is safer. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: M. Rudolph

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: I use these sheets for storing my paper crafting dies. They are perfect and easy to use - plus a great value. I have been a repeat customer several times and can't say enough how happy I am with these!
customer_reviews.author: Nanalady

customer_reviews.title: Worked well
customer_reviews.text: Worked great to turn stickers into fridge manganates. Will probably buy more soon.
customer_reviews.author: West7503

customer_reviews.title: won't hold anything but other magnets
customer_reviews.text: very weak magnets, i would not trust these to hold anything but another magnet. i wanted them for organizing tools but they can't even hold onto the smallest nut or tinniest screw. stacking the sheets does not make them stronger
customer_reviews.author: Logan

customer_reviews.title: I'm using these for my thin metal dies for card making.
customer_reviews.text: Just the right size for my Sizzix thin dies. Keeps everything together. no lost pieces. Makes storage easy.
customer_reviews.author: aeh

customer_reviews.title: Quality sticky back
customer_reviews.text: I bought these self adhesive magnet sheets to turn old wood puzzle pieces into magnets. Great sticky back and hard to peel off once adhered. Highly reccomend.
customer_reviews.author: De

customer_reviews.title: Stickers
customer_reviews.text: We were given a bunch of custom stickers for Xmas and since i didn't have anywhere i wanted to permanently stick them to, we decided to turn them into magnets for the fridge. These are thicker than some sheets of magnets I've seen in the past. They stick well to the fridge. I don't think they would hold up more than a sheet of paper, but since we're just using them for decoration, they do the job for us. They were super easy to cut with a sharp pair of scissors.
customer_reviews.author: zagmek

customer_reviews.title: Storing
customer_reviews.text: Now all my crafting dies are secure and easy to find. love these magnetic sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Alexina McAllister

customer_reviews.title: Not made for outdoors but overall the magnet holds
customer_reviews.text: Not great for outdoor use. I bought to make labels for metal barrels that are stored on a covered porch. The white side of the magnet started wrinkling. Probably won’t last much longer but in that case I’ll make labels and attach directly on magnet.
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great for turning 4x6 photos into magnets! Mush cheeper than purchasing from large box stores photo departments pre-printed. These hold up well, we sent several in the mail and made perfect gifts for family members. Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Just a Normal Family

customer_reviews.title: Adhesive Magnetic Sheets
customer_reviews.text: These were amazing! Allowed me to easily turn my designs into magnets. Easy to use, easy to cut, easy on the wallet. No comment on durability as that has not be tested yet, but would definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: LadyFer999

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This was very easy to apply to the pictures. My wedding photographer provided postcards instead of magnets that I requested for my save the dates. I searched in Amazon and found this item. It works perfectly i wish I ordered more.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Robinson Edison

customer_reviews.title: Versatile for diy projects
customer_reviews.text: I used these to turn some empty tea tins and mint tins into mini makeup holders. I put one sample sized blush mini tin and one eyeshadow pot inside. No more powder-filled bathroom drawers and purses! The magnetic sheets cut easily and stuck fast inside the tins.
customer_reviews.author: Read by Candelight

customer_reviews.title: Easy to cut, holds paper well
customer_reviews.text: These sheets were perfect for school! I cut them up and used them for locker name tags. Only needed 2 little pieces to keep the name tags on. Very strong hold for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: GenieJean

customer_reviews.title: Not what I had hoped for
customer_reviews.text: They are not very strong as far as the magnetic part and the adhesive backing doesn’t stick well so I had to add super glue to make them work. I can’t really use them for my projects.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle D.

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these to use on magnetic children's board to hold a few pieces of chalk in a plastic holder....they stick to each other, but won't hold anything up on the refrigerator or the magnetic boards
customer_reviews.author: EDRN

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: I got these to turn my large collection of stickers into a large collection of magnets. They're super easy to use, the backing is nice and sticky, and you definitely get a lot for your money, not like the magnetic tape that's overpriced at craft stores. I'll definitely buy this again if I ever use up the first package.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great little magnet sheets.
customer_reviews.text: I have these stuck on my crafting room walls in simple little patterns in different places with magnets stuck to them to give us a place to stick a note on a project we are working on. The measurements we need, a list of supplies needed, a calendar of what has to happed for a project to be done by a specific date all kinds of things like this.
customer_reviews.author: Jeralcur

customer_reviews.title: Make sticker magnets with this!
customer_reviews.text: YES! I saw on tik tok that you can make magnets out of your old stickers. Such a simple idea but I LOVE it. I bought this and it’s super easy to use and cut out my stickers. I’m super happy with this and I went a little crazy with my stickers but I still have some sheets left over now. Great buy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Barely magnetic
customer_reviews.text: These are useless to me and won’t even stay snugly on my refrigerator. They are going back as I needed “magnetic” sheets and this doesn’t fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: iPad mama

customer_reviews.title: Great for storing cutting dies!
customer_reviews.text: These fit nicely in plastic divider sheets, use them to store my cutting die sets and individual ones too. A regular sized die or die set fits perfectly on them. Have ordered them 3 times already, love them!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen Dahlke

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Good product for a good price. I used them to store my cutting dies, work great holds them well. Bought several more they worked so well.
customer_reviews.author: Yiayia

customer_reviews.title: It will do
customer_reviews.text: This will be great for my.smaller die cuts but will be buying another size for medium size framelits and die cuts
customer_reviews.author: Lilbit’s Creations

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: This item works perfect for storing my metal cut dies on. I will purchase more & do recommend them for metal cutting dies.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnets
customer_reviews.text: VERY weak magnets. The description should probably be a clue as it says "great for pictures". I seriously doubt this stuff could hold much more than a piece of paper to anything.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: virtually zero magnetic strength
customer_reviews.text: The power of these magnets is virtually non existent. It doesn't even hold a photograph to my refrigerator. I'm not sure what they may hold.
customer_reviews.author: C. mitchelson

customer_reviews.title: Sheets work well for use with cutting dies.
customer_reviews.text: These magnetic sheets work well for storing my craft cutting dies.
customer_reviews.author: JoEllen Wyatt

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Works good! Wish the magnets were a little stronger and bigger (they're about the size of a bigger index card) but they definitely do the job!
customer_reviews.author: Kawaii Neko

customer_reviews.title: Die cut holders
customer_reviews.text: Put them on file folders and in a file cabinet. Holds all my die cuts nicely and organized!
customer_reviews.author: Anita

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Love it... turned our bumper stickers into magnets to use on our Cruise Ship doors.
customer_reviews.author: Selena

customer_reviews.title: Weak magnet
customer_reviews.text: 4x6 sheet was purchased to hold a small 6x9 clipboard to metal surfaces. The magnet is so weak it will not hold the clipboard even while it’s empty of paper!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey H. Whitley

customer_reviews.title: not very magnetic
customer_reviews.text: These wouldn't hold straight pins without them falling off. I guess it is only to used to stick things to the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for small fridge projects. Or pictures. Not to sure about outdoor use
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product, main purpose was to hold my OHV permit to the truck when I go offroad, rather use this then to stick the decals directly to the car itself. Wish the magnet was a little stronger but for what it is it’s good.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but adhesive was not as strong as I need it to be. I was using it on thin wood slices though, so it may work fine sticking to paper. Magnets are strong for how thin they are and they hold up a thin wood slice well.
customer_reviews.author: Jaclyn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive seemed to be tackier than most that I have used. Please don't change that! It makes my job so much easier and I will definitely be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: User

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Convert Photos into Magnets
customer_reviews.text: These are easy to use and can turn almost any photo or post card into a fridge magnet. I've used larger sheets before, but I prefer the 4x6 packet because it accommodates most items. If you need to, just cut a second one into a smaller piece to reinforce a larger item.
customer_reviews.author: Janet

customer_reviews.title: Great for Save the Dates
customer_reviews.text: Used them to make my own Save the Dates. They are strong magnets, as in you can hold one piece of paper on the fridge with them, I checked! They are easy to cut and the adhesive is strong, once you put something on, there's no taking off.
customer_reviews.author: Devin

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect for what I was needing them for. They are thin but have a great stick!
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Storage for scrapbook dies
customer_reviews.text: I have only looked at the product as I will be placing my scrapbook dies on these magnetic strips for storage purposes. I was surprised how heavy they are, but are a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Bonny

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I guess they’re cheap enough, but I’d never bought adhesive magnets before so I didn’t know. They definitely don’t stick. If they do, the magnet’s so weak it won’t hold up a small, very light perler bead project. Don’t recommend- doubt they’d hold up a piece of paper or photo.
customer_reviews.author: Veronika Sorensen

customer_reviews.title: Made magnets out of bumper stickers
customer_reviews.text: We want to decorate our garage fridge with travel stickers but wanted to be able to move them around and remove them if the fridge should ever break like our friends’ just did. This product is great & easy to use& good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Sail Mom 3

customer_reviews.title: the delivery was fast and i love the fact that my pictures are well organized and ...
customer_reviews.text: i got the 4x6 adhesive magnetics for pictures, the delivery was fast and i love the fact that my pictures are well organized and neat on the fridge.. Very easy to install and now my fridge is like a photo collage.
customer_reviews.author: Lisboeta00

customer_reviews.title: Great product but stickiness seems a bit weak
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make magnets and they work. They're easy but I worry about the longevity of the stickiness. I might add a bit of glue. It's so easy to use though that I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Mia Zari

customer_reviews.title: Sticking together
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to make bookmarks for gifts and I think these will work perfectly. They arrived on time and were packaged well. Very pleased with this purchase
customer_reviews.author: Karen D B

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for creating magnetic displays
customer_reviews.text: I bought these so I could create magnetic photos of our adventures as a surprise for my wife. They worked perfectly!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for crafts
customer_reviews.text: Worked really well for my use. Made some magnets using these and stickers for my kids to play with.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great. Using for large magnetic erase board for recurring events/appts so I don't have to write them every month.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to line, but very nice
customer_reviews.text: This is tricky to put on. You have to start at the button and then place them together. I give them as gifts and they stick to the fridge.
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Pretty happy
customer_reviews.text: I needed magnetic sheets for a craft project and these worked great. Strong enough to hold and thin enough to cut easily.
customer_reviews.author: mfetgatterTop Contributor: Coloring

customer_reviews.title: Made the perfect gifts for mother's day for my mom and mother ...
customer_reviews.text: Made the perfect gifts for mother's day for my mom and mother in law. The magnets are pretty strong and the adhesive sticks very well to the pictures I used for them.
customer_reviews.author: Tina MamaBear Pinto

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: The adhesive is amazing. I bought the sheets to make stickers for my locker at work. They’re easy to cut and stick very well!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Berkeley

customer_reviews.title: Buy. Buy. Buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love. Flexible. Strong adhesive. Applied to foam ghosts n bats to stick on the garage door. Worked like a charm and that's saying alot with Kansas crazy weather.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dominguez

customer_reviews.title: Magnetic Sheets
customer_reviews.text: Flexible Adhesive Magnetic Sheets at 4-inch x 6-inch Peel and Stick are perfectly sized for storing metal dies.
customer_reviews.author: lorraine

customer_reviews.title: Great price and fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: These were just what I needed for a great price and fast shipping. It works well on my diy “save the date” for my wedding.
customer_reviews.author: RJ051086

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Read size if you are looking for bigger they are an A4 but still good product for the price
customer_reviews.author: Maylynn

customer_reviews.title: Party Time
customer_reviews.text: Laminated a heart design and made 50 refrigerator magnets for a women's Valentine's party. Easy and inexpensive.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Krull

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for what I need
customer_reviews.text: Great, so far. It fits the 4X6 picture perfectly and are easy to use. I was really happy with the final result.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy Helzer

customer_reviews.title: No maginetizem , but sticks good
customer_reviews.text: It is made to be very flexible,which it is But, the magnetic property is almost non-existent to hold anything, not even a small metal #8 washer. Very disappointed in the product.
customer_reviews.author: bob

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Used these to turn the collectible stickers I get with everything into fridge magnets. Easy to use and cut to size, looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flexible Adhesive Magnetic Sheets Paper 4-inch x 6-inch
customer_reviews.text: GOOD VALUE...WE MAKE PICTURE MAGNETS - SLUE PHOTO ON AND TA DA! RLW
customer_reviews.author: RLW

customer_reviews.title: Don't expect strong magnet
customer_reviews.text: While product is easy to handle and cut, magnet only able to hold up (maybe) a sheet of paper.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dosaj

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for DIY Magnets
customer_reviews.text: These sheets are fantastic for making your own magnets. The adhesive is strong, but not overly so and the sheets themselves are not too thin, but thin enough that you shouldn't have trouble cutting out shapes with an everyday scissor.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Barely magnetic
customer_reviews.text: I bought this intending to turn a regular palette into a magnetic one. The adhesive sticks to plastic well with no residue. However the magnet completely fails to hold onto a tiny eyeshadow pan. If it's tilted beyond 45 degrees, it completely slips around. Stacking magnets doesn't increase the strength either. It's unusable.
customer_reviews.author: SFM

customer_reviews.title: Not very strong
customer_reviews.text: These sheet magnets are easy to cut to any size but the weren’t all that strong.
customer_reviews.author: BobLap

customer_reviews.title: These magnets are very weak
customer_reviews.text: These would not be good for anything more than just a thin piece of inkjet paper. Anything heavier, like photo card stock, and they will not hold. It barely holds its own weight without sliding down a vertical surface. Not worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Donald Emeigh

customer_reviews.title: Great for Photo Magnets
customer_reviews.text: We made photo magnets for all the Valentines Day newborns. They were a huge hit!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Crafting
customer_reviews.text: I used these on the backs of my save the dates for my wedding. They did the job perfectly and saved me from having to order pricey magnets. I prefer to do little diy projects and these worked! Would definitely buy again

customer_reviews.title: Non magnetic
customer_reviews.text: Strips are not very magnetic, I placed them on my fridge and they are unable to hold a picture, even tho it's a small one my magnets can not hold the pics up. Too bad I already opened up the package or I would have returned them.

product_meta.title: Flexible Adhesive Magnetic Sheets Paper 4-inch x 6-inch Peel and Stick, Works Great for Pictures!, Cuts to Any Size! Pack of 12
product_meta.description: Self-Adhesive Magnets Just peel back the protective paper and place your photo; it's that easy! Some trimming may be required, it's easy with the interchangeable die cutter Each piece is 20-30 mil. Works great for keeping your Stamping Dies in place and organized
feature_bullets: Just peel the back protective paper and place your photo, it's that easy!
Perfect for photos, kids drawings, DIY Save the Dates and more!
Works great for keeping your Stamping Dies in place and organized
4" x 6" - size of standard picture. Cut easily to any size, for any project!
Sold as pack of 12 Proudly Made in the USA!
